Cut‑List Optimizer

Enter stock length, kerf, and required cuts to minimize waste.

How to use

  1. Enter stock length and kerf.
  2. Paste your required cuts, one per line.
  3. Click Optimize to get boards and waste.

Optimize cut list

Recommended

Rip‑cut bladeThin‑kerf for less waste. Stop blockRepeatable lengths.

Tips & gotchas

  • Add 5–10% contingency for defects.
  • Group similar cuts to reduce setup time.
